Synopsis: Initializes and registers the Tavily AI Tool.
Description: The New-TavilyAITool function initializes the Tavily AI Tool and registers the Invoke-WebSearch tool.
Notes: This function writes a verbose message when it is loaded.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-TavilyAITool
This command initializes and registers the Tavily AI Tool.
